page.title: 10HOME LIFE - continued
page.content: After assembly it is Maths, English or Composition. At playtime - 10.30 am - we do Social Studies - History, Georgraphy and Environmental Studies until 12.15 pm. We have dinner at school which is cooked in the school kitchen. We eat it in the Hall. I sit with 5 other children and help serve their food. After dinner there is a 30-minute break and lessons begin at 1.15 pm. During the afternoons we play games - football, rounders and netball, do Art and Craft, Home Economies and Topic. We have a 10-minute break and go home at 3.30 pm. I go back to the hotel by taxi and my mother takes me home. I play outside with my football until Juliet comes home, then we have tea. I stay inside and watch TV until my bedtime at around 9.30 pm.
